alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kay, northwestern Noble, Grant and northeastern Garfield Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 241 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of South Haven to 3 miles northeast of Breckenridge. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Medford, Newkirk, Pond Creek, Garber, Billings, Lamont, Red Rock, Kremlin, Marland, Braman, Hunter, Deer Creek, Kildare, Jefferson, Renfrow, Chilocco, and Nardin. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 193 and 236. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
